item.description:
Join Members and Guests of the South Shore Fitness Meetup Group as we participate in a 5k Walk/Run Fundraiser Alzheimer's Disease! 5k is approximately 3.1 miles. The walk is 1 mile.

Check-in at the Registration Table at the Braintree Town Hall after 8am. We'll have a meeting spot somewhere near the statues in front of the Town Hall. Let's plan to meet around 9:30am to stretch and socialize. We'll try to regroup in the same area afterwards. The Registration Form is in the Files Section. The route is fairly flat. We will jog a "practice" on September 29th.


5k Walk/Run Road Race Fundraiser
Sunday, October 4th
Race Starts @ 9:30am
Meet by 9am
Braintree Town Hall
One JFK Memorial Drive
Braintree, MA 02184

Meeting Place: In front of the town hall, where the statues are.

Cost: $17 by September 29th, $20 on Race Day (Non-Refundable) / The Registration Form is in the Files Section. If you have trouble opening it please let me know and I'll bring it to the next event you are attending (as long as we are going to the same event).

Event Fee: NONE!

Organizer(s): Julie & Amanda
Min/Max: There is no minimum. Attendance is unlimited.
Guests: Welcome!

RSVP Deadline: Please finalize your RSVP by NOON on Saturday, October 3rd

Please Note in your RSVP Comments if you are Walking or Running. Please print the Registration Form in the Files Section and mail it in or bring it with you.

Inclement Weather: The Road Race is taking place rain or shine.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions: listed on the registration form.

Check out this site for tips (especially the warmup tips, but read the comments too. I found those pretty helpful as well)
http://www.runnerswor...
item.how_to_find_us: we will meet by the statues in front of the town hall

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Forget Me Not Road Race (5K run/ 1 mile walk)
